mapper.insert: insert into place (placeName, placeAddr, outLine, tel, writeDate, id) values (#{placeName}, #{placeAddr}, #{outLine}, #{tel}, sysdate, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT reviewContents FROM (SELECT placeName,reviewContents,to_char(writeDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')writeDate FROM review ORDER BY writeDate desc) where placeName=#{placeName} and ROWNUM =1
select round(avg(reviewAppraisal),0) from review where placeName = #{placeName}
